title: Response as expected from School Board
description: As expected, the school board did not hear these voices, and in a closed meeting determined that they will not be changing the policy. They are still likening the military sash to “individual recognition” instead of a military honor and right to wear. Although disappointed, it’s exactly what I expected given the resistance to change and the “good ole boys club” mentality. Meaningful change is never easy to achieve, and rest assured we’ll keep working avenues in the background to #honorouryoungservicemembers. Please continue to share and sign!

title: 100+ signatures!
description: Thanks for your amazing support! Let’s keep this going and have our voices heard!
